comment.author: 14651149@N00
comment._content: I think this one must have been taken around the same time, and shows some fellows sitting on a camera: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/cwp2003000779/PP/

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Yes, LWyman, this photo by George Barnard was taken around the same time.  Most likely one of the chaps sitting or standing round the camera was photographer Samuel Cooley, who took a number of photographs of Fort Sumter after the battle.
